mapper.select: SELECT R_NUM, T3.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, T2.* FROM (SELECT T.*, PI.P_ROUTE, M.M_ADDRESS, M.M_NAME FROM TRAVELERS T, PROFILE_IMAGE PI, MEMBER M WHERE T.M_ID = PI.M_ID AND PI.M_ID = M.M_ID AND PI.P_MAIN = 1 ORDER BY T_DATEOFVISIT ASC) T2) T3 WHERE T3.T_COUNTRY LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%' AND (R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRAVELERS WHERE UPPER(T_COUNTRY) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%'
